name: Pixel Quest
description:
Web game for #onebuttonjam 2016, done in about 5 days.

You can view the jam page here and you can also play it online here.

Click or press spacebar to play. Fly around and stay alive! Dodge the bullets and see how long you can last.

Technologies used:

  • Pyxeledit for the 2d art.
  • TexturePacker for asset handling
  • Usfxr for sound generation
  • Unity with C#

Post Jam Updates:

  • Enabled mouse click support
  • Death text
  • Physics tweeks
  • Gun tweeks

Code for this project can be found online here.
